documentation.text:
@dev Emitted when the author creates the campaign.
  @param _ipfshash The url hash of the campaign data stored in IPFS.
@dev Emitted when a new person contributes with the campaign.

@dev Emitted when the author creates a proposal to free founds.
  @param _ipfshash The url hash of the proposal data stored in IPFS.

@dev Emitted when a proposal is voted.
  @param _index The index of the proposal.

@dev Emitted when a proposal is Closed.
  @param _index The index of the proposal.

@dev Emitted when a proposal was withdraw.
  @param _index The index of the proposal.

@dev Emitted when a member creates a proposal to destruct the campaign and get the founds back.
  @param _ipfshash The url hash of the destruct proposal data stored in IPFS.

@dev Emitted when a destruct proposal is voted.
  @param _index The index of the destruct proposal.

@dev Emitted when a  destruct proposal is Closed.
  @param _index The index of the destruct proposal.

@dev Emitted when the author creates a progress update to show how the proyect is going.
  @param _ipfshash The url hash of the progress update data stored in IPFS.
@dev Emitted when the status of the campaign change.
@dev Allow not members to contribute with the campaign and be a member of it.
@dev Allow only owner to change the status of the cCampaign from CREATED to ACTIVE.

@dev Allow only owner to save a new progress Update data ipfs hash.
  @param _ipfshash url hash of the progress update data (description and pictures) previusly stored in IPFS.

CampaignCreated(bytes32).details: Emitted when the author creates the campaign.

params._ipfshash: The url hash of the campaign data stored in IPFS.

ChangeStatusCampaign().details: Emitted when the status of the campaign change.

DestructProposalClosed(uint256).details: Emitted when a  destruct proposal is Closed.

params._index: The index of the destruct proposal.

DestructProposalCreated(bytes32).details: Emitted when a member creates a proposal to destruct the campaign and get the founds back.

params._ipfshash: The url hash of the destruct proposal data stored in IPFS.

DestructProposalVoted(uint256).details: Emitted when a destruct proposal is voted.

params._index: The index of the destruct proposal.

NewContribution().details: Emitted when a new person contributes with the campaign.

ProgressUpdate(bytes32).details: Emitted when the author creates a progress update to show how the proyect is going.

params._ipfshash: The url hash of the progress update data stored in IPFS.

ProposalClosed(uint256).details: Emitted when a proposal is Closed.

ProposalCreated(bytes32).details: Emitted when the author creates a proposal to free founds.

params._ipfshash: The url hash of the proposal data stored in IPFS.

ProposalVoted(uint256).details: Emitted when a proposal is voted.

ProposalWithdraw(uint256).details: Emitted when a proposal was withdraw.

approveProposal(uint256).details: Allow only members to approve an active proposal that they haven't voted before.

params._index: index of the proposal the member wants to approve.

aproveDestructProposal(uint256).details: Allow only members to approve an active destruct proposal that they haven't voted before.

params._index: index of the destruct proposal the member wants to approve.

closeDestructProposal(uint256).details: Allow only members to close an active proposal that already has its voting time over.

params._index: index of the proposal the member wants to approve.

closeProposal(uint256).details: Allow only members to close an active proposal that already has its voting time over.

params._index: index of the proposal the member wants to approve.

params._goal: goal in wei that the proyect has to reach to be succesfull.
params._ipfshash: The url hash of the campaign data previusly stored in IPFS.*
params._minimunContribution: minimum contribution in wei that a person has to make to become a member.

contribute().details: Allow not members to contribute with the campaign and be a member of it.

createDestructProposal(bytes32).details: Allow only members to create a new proposal to finish de proyect and get the founds back.

params._ipfshash: url hash of the destruct proposal data (description) previusly stored in IPFS.

createProposal(uint256,address,bytes32).details: Allow only owner to create a new proposal to get more founds.

params._ipfshash: url hash of the proposal data (description and pictures) previusly stored in IPFS.
params._recipient: address where the founds are going to be after withdraw them.
params._value: founds in wei that the owner want to withdraw.

disapproveDestructProposal(uint256).details: Allow only members to disapprove an active destruct proposal that they haven't voted before.

params._index: index of the destruct proposal the member wants to disapprove.

disapproveProposal(uint256).details: Allow only members to disapprove an active proposal that they haven't voted before.

params._index: index of the proposal the member wants to disapprove.

getCampaignInfo().details: Function to get the data of the campaign

getDestructProposal(uint256).details: Function to get the data of a destruct proposal.

params._index: index of the proposal to return

getDestructProposalsCount().details: Function to get the total number of destruct proposals.

getFinalContributions().details: Function to get the finalContributions of the campaign.

getProposal(uint256).details: Function to get the data of a proposal.

params._index: index of the proposal to return

getProposalsCount().details: Function to get the total number of proposals.

getRemainingContributions().details: Function to get the remainingContributions of the campaign.

getStatus().details: Function to get the actual status of the campaign.

hasVotedDestructProposal(uint256).details: Function to know if a member has already vot a destruct proposal.

hasVotedProposal(uint256).details: Function to know if a member has already vot a proposal.

isMember(address).details: Function to return if someone is member.

saveProgressUpdate(bytes32).details: Allow only owner to save a new progress Update data ipfs hash.

params._ipfshash: url hash of the progress update data (description and pictures) previusly stored in IPFS.

setActive().details: Allow only owner to change the status of the cCampaign from CREATED to ACTIVE.

withdraw(uint256).details: Allow only members to close an active proposal that already has its voting time over.

params._index: index of the proposal the member wants to approve.
